# runpod_network_volumes (Data Source)

Data source to list all RunPod Network Volumes.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `network_volumes` (Attributes List) List of Network Volumes. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--network_volumes))

<a id="nestedatt--network_volumes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `network_volumes`

Read-Only:

- `data_center_id` (String) The data center ID where the Network Volume is located.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the Network Volume.
- `name` (String) The name of the Network Volume.
- `size` (Number) The size of the Network Volume in GB.
